title: ZipReg
author: ZipReg
created_time: July 02, 2022, 09:10:41 PMLast edit: July 09, 2022, 06:29:58 PM by ZipReg
content: Hey guys!  I hope you're all doing well! I had a little free time today to put something together and join in on this great, feel good movement!Thanks again to all those creators who have graciously offer up pieces of their work to the community!BEAR market BLUES got you down? BTC To The Future! gonna try to TURN IT AROUND! ¬†I'm just hoping to put a smile where that frown may be, even if only for a bit! (pun intended)RULESChoose a number between 00 - 99 (no random)Please use ## - name to select your numberRequirements: Minimum 1 MeritLast two digits in the hash of the block chosen will be the winner!*** FREE SHIPPING Included! ***Today we have a piece from my very first release here, before CoolStorage.org existed.2018 BTC To The Future! v1.0 Limited Edition Series #087 of 100Available Spots00 - Saxoshi01 - Abiky02 - almond03 - Thiago00704 - Otillio13300506 - GazetaBitcoin07 - krogoth08 - Danydee0910 - MoparMiningLLC11 - YodasRedRocket12 - Steeley13 - geophphreigh14 - BTCOVERFIATS1516 - Streissi17 - turbodogma18 - buckrogers19 - doblezero2021 - Remsjack2223 - Frank AlpenCoin24 - abel133725 - owlcatz26 - MrMojoRising2627 - Crytocanuk28293031 - Darker4532 - Jambo USA33 - 2stout3435 - bavicrypto36 - Text37 - Dernoste38 - iced39 - Suzuki Matt40 - PawGo 41 - NeuroticFish42 - tweetious43 - cygan4445 - tread934647 - Abubhakar48 - hotdog749 - klarki50 - aoluain51 - Mbitr52 - digicoinuser5354 - sunnyb55 - Peak5657 - The_Crypto_Kid5859 - PM-ICT60616263 - -doubleU-64 - Cryptogreatdane65 - xSlyy6667 - TheBeardedBaby6869 - hookzup170 - Markzellers71 - rat03gopoh727374 - Willi997475 - Caribbean_Treasures76 - bitbollo77 - Warfare787980 - Buchi-8881- CoinageMint82 - tldr-hodl83 - haloxon 84 - PINKY123485 - bitcoiner24h8687 - Koal-8488 - sheenshane8990 - tranthidung919293 - Fattcatt94959697 - DirtyBirdE98 - JanEmil99 - MortareThank You & Good Luck! ¬†* comit built this one very nicely
